TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompositeDesignerTheme extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class controls the look and feel of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> object on a workflow design surface.
## Examples The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#30)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#30)]
To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#24)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#24)]

Docs.summary: Gets the of the expand button on the composite activity designer.
Docs.value: A object that contains information about the height and width of the expand button on the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Drawing.Brush GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rectangle) cil managed

Docs.param: The that defines the bounds of the expand button on the .
Docs.summary: Retrieves a brush that defines the background display properties of the expand button on the composite activity designer.
Docs.returns: A object that uses the parameter to define the button area in which the brush applies two colors in a linear gradient from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the expand button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the background brush for the expand button is not set to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) before <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush%2A> is called, the method disposes of the previous brush and creates a new one.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those provided by the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.Initialize%2A> method obtains settings for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> object from the operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnAmbientPropertyChanged(valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty ambientProperty) cil managed

Docs.param: The enumeration value which the composite designer theme should now use.
Docs.summary: Notifies the object that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When this method is called it sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings. If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property. If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WatermarkImage As Image
public: property System::Drawing::Image ^ WatermarkImage { System::Drawing::Image ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.
Docs.value: The object to use as the watermark for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) this property will provide the image for the watermark. If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property is set to a valid value, this property is set to `null` (`Nothing`).
